original_text: He shall not depart out of darkness; the flame shall dry up his branches, and by the breath of his mouth shall he go away.
korean_text: 어두운 곳을 떠나지 못하리니 불꽃이 그의 가지를 말릴 것이라 하나님의 입김으로 그가 불려가리라

sentences.original_text: He shall not depart out of darkness
flame shall dry up his branches
and by breath of his mouth
